Title: Zigby
Plot: Zigby is a charming 3D animated series that takes pre-schoolers on an awe inspiring journey through the jungle ... with a gungho Zebra, a not-so-bright Meerkat and a nervous Guinea Fowl. Imagine the adventures these three friends will take the audience on - roaming free in a jungle that?s jam-packed with places to explore and surprises waiting around every corner.
